title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Mix-ups and misunderstandings are part of the picture today. Its possible youre misreading a partner or loved one wants or needs. But it probably doesnt help if theyre not upfront or entirely clear about whats going on with them, either. Logic only takes you so far in figuring out anyones motivations. You must rely on your intuition as well. Listening without interruption or judgment might also provide important clues. Bring as much patience and faith to the table as you can muster. The key to your relationship success is a loving heart and a perceptive mind. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
